alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 03 at 2:24PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT FRIDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands, Owyhee Mountains and Southern Twin Falls County. * WHEN...From midnight Friday night to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
